mapper.select: select count(*) from users where user_nickname not in('ADMIN')

select e.* from ( select rownum as rn , f.*, d.genre from users f , (select a.user_no, LISTAGG(c.genre_name, ',') within group (order by c.genre_name) as genre from users a, movie_taste b, genre c where a.user_no = b.user_no and b.genre_no = c.genre_no and a.user_nickname not in('ADMIN') group by a.user_no order by a.user_no desc) d where f.user_no = d.user_no) e where e.rn between #{beginRecord} and #{endRecord}

select c.* from ( select rownum as rn, b.* from ( select a.movie_no, a.movie_title, a.movie_director, a.movie_audience, a.movie_opening_date, a.movie_nation, a.movie_story, a.movie_web_score, LISTAGG(c.genre_name, ',') within group (order by c.genre_name) as genre_name from movie a, movie_genre b, genre c where a.movie_no = b.movie_no and b.genre_no = c.genre_no group by a.movie_no, a.movie_title, a.movie_director, a.movie_audience, a.movie_opening_date, a.movie_nation, a.movie_story, a.movie_web_score order by a.movie_no desc) b) c where rn between #{beginRecord} and #{endRecord}

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.* FROM (SELECT Q.*, U.USER_NICKNAME, R.QNA_REPLY_CONTENT FROM QNA Q, USERS U, QNA_REPLY R WHERE Q.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND Q.QNA_NO = R.QNA_NO(+) ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
SELECT Q.*, U.USER_NICKNAME FROM QNA Q, USERS U WHERE Q.USER_NO = U.USER_NO AND QNA_NO = #{qna_no}
